name: HOW TO MAKE WISE DECISIONS IN LIFE
description: A series of Lectures for UG and PG Students on aspects of "Taking Decisons"

recent_episodes.title: Episode 03: FOBO Fear of Better Options
recent_episodes.description:
The Fear of Better Options (FOBO) is The Reason You Can’t Make a Tough Decisions, a phenomenon for fear that you’ll miss out on the “best” one, leading to indecision, frustration, stress, regret, and unhappiness.
